ObjectClass.Name: Marauder ATHC
ObjectClass.Description:
MARAUDER ALL-TERRAIN HOVERCRAFT: Very fast, AG only stealth tank Good at harassment, scouting, and ambush
Cloaks; Builds production + defense buildings Can use Combat Overcharge ability: Temporarily boosts combat stats Upgradable with Machinery Tech

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location \Move Speed: 6, MaxInc: 45\Vision Range: 24, Aggro Radius: 30 \Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location \3X while overcharged with Machinery Tech \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs]\Ground: 50 (+100), R 8, Sta B

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective\ \Return to idling or hold fire

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: Teleport to a specified location\or self-teleport within LOS range\Teleporters extend range and negate cost\ \Blocked by Temporal Soliton Shield (TSS)

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to a specified point in time\ \Recharges Shields 50%\Must not have a TSS

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Not Available\ Requires Gate Tech\ upgrade at the [GATE TECH BUILDING]

Objective.Name: Combat Overcharge
Objective.Details: Gives 3x HP for 20 s; Removes cloak \Activates automatically in combat\ \Upgradable with Machinery Tech:\ + 20s duration, 2x attack rate

Objective.Name: Build
Objective.Details: \Select a building to create:\ \RP, IMPORTER, ARMORY,\FACTORY, TURRET, MACROFAB

Objective.Name: Resource Processor
Objective.Details: - place near resource crates\Small building\processes L-Crystals and Q-Plasma\Converts Q-P into L-C\Can move itslef

Objective.Name: Importer
Objective.Details: Medium building\Imports RESERVE SOLDIERS\ RESERVE SOLDIERS are deployed\ automatically to drive or\ pilot the vehicles you build

Objective.Name: Factory
Objective.Details: Medium building\produces the following units:\MECH, ATHC, LANCER, TANK,\TORNADE

Objective.Name: Armory
Objective.Details: Medium building\performs tech tree upgrades\produces the following units:\MARINE, SPECIAL OP

Objective.Name: Defense Turret
Objective.Details: Small building\Breaks TSS\Detects cloaked units\Splash damage weapon(self-upgradable)\[Weapon] Ground:57(+8) Air:105(+15)

Objective.Name: Macrofab
Objective.Details: Produces the following units:\MAR, FRIGATE, MFB, BLACKBIRD,\HEAVY CRUISER\Equips HEAVY CRUISER with nukes

ObjectClass.Name: Marauder ATHC (Overcharge)
ObjectClass.Description:
MARAUDER ALL-TERRAIN HOVERCRAFT: Very fast, AG only stealth tank Good at harassment, scouting, and ambush
Cloaks; Builds production + defense buildings Can use Combat Overcharge ability: Temporarily boosts combat stats Upgradable with Machinery Tech

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location \Move Speed: 6, MaxInc: 45\Vision Range: 24, Aggro Radius: 30 \Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack specified target or enemies spotted\ en route to specified location\[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs]\VS Ground: 150, R: 8\VS Air: 0

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective\ \Return to idling or hold fire

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: Teleport to a specified location\or self-teleport within LOS range\Teleporters extend range and negate cost\ \Blocked by Temporal Soliton Shield (TSS)

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to a specified point in time\ \Recharges Shields 50%\Must not have a TSS

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Not Available\ Requires Gate Tech\ upgrade at the [GATE TECH BUILDING]

ObjectClass.Name: Marauder ATHC (Wreckage)
ObjectClass.Description:
This ATHC is destroyed Beware of internal explosions
Duration: 40 s Explosive for 22 s, 120 damage
